channel.title: Heres my question
channel.description: ok this should be the right section for this question (and i am sorry for posting in the wrong sections several times) anyways my question: does anyone know how to change the armour of an npc?(somebody said no) so if you cant is there anyway you can code it or something? so you are able to?
